attributes.additional_details:
Immigrants come to this country and get benefits in the form of money/houses etc when they have put nothing in to the economy. Its an easier life for them, that's why they move here.
I think its disgusting that they can claim benefits for their children that still live in their original country!
Our country is not in a good financial state and we should not allow our money to be taken advantage of.
I think it would be interesting to see how the immigration levels drop.......
